DOC.criteria: Sign inform consent ; Diagnosis glaucoma ocular hypertension ; On stable regimen intraocular pressure ( IOP ) lower medication ( monotherapy ) ; IOP , opinion investigator , participation study present risk ocular health ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Best correct visual acuity bad 0.60 logMAR ( 20/80 Snellen ) either eye ; Pregnant , nursing , use highly effective birth control method ; Use oral topical corticosteroid within 30 day Screening Visit course study ; History bronchial asthma severe chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
